title: Of course Brexit is being frustrated by Oliver Letwin, he has spent decades causing chaos
text:
It will have surprised no one that it was Sir Oliver Letwin behind the amendment that has thrown an almighty spanner in the Brexit works. David Cameron’s former "fixer" has spent decades demonstrating his reverse Midas Touch, leaving chaos in the wake of everything he comes across.

The past 48 hours were archetypal Letwin. It was Sir Oliver who, in March, led the move to take control of the House of Commons away from the government in order to test alternatives to Mrs May’s deal. It may seem as if, other than wreaking havoc to Mrs May’s plans, the impact of his actions was limited. But this is typical; it is usually in the medium and long term afterwards when disaster strikes.

Without Letwin,...
description: It will have surprised no one that it was Sir Oliver Letwin behind the amendment that has thrown an almighty spanner in the Brexit works.
